resources.string:
"{
" " imagePanel: {
" " align: 'top',
" " borderRadius: '10px'
" " },
" " controlBar: {
" " height: '40px',
" " borderRadius: '20px',
" " borderColor: 'transparent',
" " background: '#e1c1ff',
" " borderColorMoving: '#0000ff',
" " backgroundMoving: 'rgba(0, 0, 255, 0.1)',
" " borderColorSuccess: '#00ff00',
" " backgroundSuccess: 'rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.1)',
" " borderColorError: '#ff0000',
" " backgroundError: 'rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.1)',
" " slideBackground: '#fff',
" " textSize: '14px',
" " textColor: 'orange'
" " },
" " gap: '30px',
" " executeBorderRadius: '4px',
" " executeBackground: 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)',
" " executeTop: '4px',
" " executeRight: '4px'
" " }"

"{
" " capBarHeight: 50,
" " capBarTextAlign: 'center',
" " capBarBorderColor: '#fff',
" " capBarTextColor: '#333',
" " capBarTextSize: 18,
" " capBarTextWeight: 600,
" " capPadding: 15,
" " capPaddingTop: 0,
" " capPaddingRight: 15,
" " capPaddingBottom: 0,
" " capPaddingLeft: 15,
" " opacity: 0.1,
" " radius: 20,
" " paddingTop: 20,
" " paddingBottom: 40
" " }"
